AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing MentionTracker, which allows users to get notified by dm if they're mentioned in a channel.
[p]help MentionTracker to see commands. No additional dependencies needed.
For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/palmtree5>
NAME: MentionTracker
DESCRIPTION: Notifies users if they're mentioned in a channel they have turned this on for
